input.name: Package Name
input.biolinks_limit_help: The total amount of biolink pages that a user can create. Set -1 for unlimited.
input.links_limit_help: The total amount of links that a user can create (shorted links). Set -1 for unlimited.

input.removable_branding_help: This gives the option for people to remove branding from the biolinks footer.
input.custom_branding_help: This gives the option for people to add their custom branding for the biolinks footer.
input.custom_colored_links_help: Gives the user the ability to customize the color of their biolinks links
input.statistics_help: Gives the user the ability to check more in depth statistics and select the time frame
input.google_analytics_help: Gives the user the ability to add Google Analytics on their biolinks pages.
input.facebook_pixel_help: Gives the user the ability to add Facebook Pixel on their biolinks pages.
input.custom_backgrounds_help: Gives the user the ability to add custom backgrounds on their biolinks pages ( colors, gradients and actual images ).
